intent_analysis:
Intent: The user wants to verify whether all the light strips in their home are currently turned on.  
Constraints & cues: The user is specifically inquiring about the status of all available meross light strips, which include three devices with varying brightness levels and color settings.  
Risk assessment: The command "all lights" is vague and could imply other types of lights not listed, such as the Samsung TV or other devices; further clarification may be needed to ensure all relevant devices are included in the check.
